scripts.start: concurrently "yarn run start:core" "yarn run start:server" "yarn run start:client"
scripts.heroku:push: git subtree push --prefix packages/sonrisa-server heroku main
scripts.build:client: yarn run build:core && yarn workspace @sonrisa/client build
scripts.build:server: yarn run build:core && yarn workspace @sonrisa/server build
scripts.build: yarn workspace @sonrisa/core build && yarn workspace @sonrisa/server build && yarn workspace @sonrisa/client build
